# King's Hill Historic District

| district_map = Kings Hill HD boundary map.png
| nocat        = yes
| architect    = Multiple
| architecture = Late 19th and Early 20th Century American Movements, Late 19th and 20th Century Revivals, Late Victorian
| added        = February 19, 1991
| area         =
| refnum       = 91000039
}}
'''King's Hill Historic District''', located in southwest Portland, Oregon, is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
See also
* Kings Hill / Southwest Salmon - station on the MAX Light Rail system
* National Register of Historic Places listings in Southwest Portland, Oregon
* Goose Hollow, Portland, Oregon
References
External links
* [https://www.portland.gov/sites/default/files/2019-07/complete.pdf King's Hill Historic District Guidelines] (PDF). 2001. Planning Bureau, City of Portland.
